name: Negroni
variations: Negroni Sbagliato (Spumante instead of Gin), Negroni Malato (add Orange Juice), Negroski (Vodka instead of Gin), Cardinaloski (Vodka instead of Gin and a few Angostura Bitters drops), Cin Cyn (Cynar instead of Campari), Boulevardier (Bourbon instead of Gin), Raultini (Aperol instead of Campari)
